text:
@JZarif @antonioguterres Still hostage taking literature? You have taken Iranians hostage and asking ransom to stop killing them? Why so many lies? Before parliamentary elections your supreme leader said #COVID19 is a hoax to reduce the voter turn-out! Now you need money to save people?
#IranCoVidTruth
